data.comment: Cercle Brugge kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Cercle Brugge kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Cercle Brugge's Kevin Hoggas scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
Lawrence Visser blows to start the second-half. Gent with the kick-off.
The away team replace Giorgi Chakvetadze with Giorgi Kvilitaia.
Bernd Storck is making the team's first substitution at Jan Breydel Stadium with Thibo Somers replacing Dino Hotic.
Giulian Biancone (Cercle Brugge) gets a yellow card.
Brecht Dejaegere is replacing Elisha Owusu for the away team.
Bernd Storck (Cercle Brugge) is making a second substitution, with Kylian Hazard replacing Marton Eppel.
It's 1-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
[10] for [11] has been booked by [28] and receives a first yellow card.
